entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 8:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.6°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
